## ValidationErrorCauseBase.message property

Error message.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
message: string;
```

## Remarks

Error messages are provided for convenience, and not stable APIs; Consumers should use [ValidationErrorCauseBase.kind](./node-client.validationerrorcausebase.kind.md) to distinguish between different error causes.
